data.title: Centerra Co-Op
data.meta_description: Centerra Co-Op is a progressive agricultural cooperative with locations in Ohio and Pennsylvania. Centerra offers a wide variety of products and services, including agronomy services, grain merchandising, livestock and animal feed, liquid fuels, propane, and much more.
data.text:
A great fuel that goes the extra mile is not the only thing that will make your fueling experience a great one. You also want:

Professional, knowledgeable and reliable customer service on your terms

Local service providers (your driver, order-taker, managers, owners — we live just down the road!)

Competitive prices

Everything you need from backyard to barnyard

Centerra Country Stores are a one-stop-shop for all your bard, garden and home needs, offering a wide variety of products including animal feed and supplies, lawn and garden needs, rock salt, decorative items, gifts and more. With knowledgeable staff and competitive prices, we provide excellent customer service and high-quality products to our customers and our communities.

Centerra Co-Op is your local source for optimal animal nutrition, whether you’re feeding a thousand head of cattle or one single Standardbred.

Our staff of knowledgeable nutrition consultants understand the diverse needs of our customers. We offer numerous product lines, including our own Centerra brands made with locally grown ingredients, to ensure your animals receive the nutrition they need to thrive.

Some of the additional brands we carry include Purina©, Lindner Show Feeds©, Buckeye Nutrition©, Semican©, Show-Rite©, Triple Crown©, Mazuri© and more, including Silostop© silage protection products.

Centerra Co-Op's full-service grain locations include Mansfield, Grafton, Loudonville, Smithville, Sullivan, Andover, Jefferson, Middlefield, Wayne Twp. & Slippery Rock. Check our Grain page for location hours.

Our Grain Marketing Office is located in Ashland, OH and our experts can access both domestic and export markets to find the best values for your grain. In addition, Centerra offers Grain Bank, Storage and Condo options for area producers.

Centerra Propane takes the stress out of running your home, farm or business. From tank installation and fill monitoring to prompt and reliable propane deliveries, you will be pleased with our professional service and competitive rates. Ask about our payment options to learn how you can manage costs associated with market fluctuations.

We provide service to North Central and Northeast Ohio, Western Pennsylvania and beyond.
